test_input: Qualify this lead for VPN cloud services. Lead: Mike Chen, CTO at TechVault Inc (200 employees, fintech). Conversation transcript: 'We're looking to secure our remote workforce. Currently evaluating VPN solutions for our 200+ employees across 3 offices. We need something that integrates with our existing cloud infrastructure on AWS. Budget is allocated for Q1. Can you walk me through your enterprise plans?'

result.summary: Highly qualified HOT lead - CTO with explicit VPN needs, approved budget, immediate timeline, and clear security requirements for 200+ employee fintech company.

buying_signals: Explicit VPN solution evaluation in progress
Specific employee count (200+) indicates enterprise need
Budget already allocated for Q1 (immediate timeline)
Active request for enterprise plan details
Fintech industry with high compliance/security requirements
data.reasoning: This is an exceptionally strong lead scoring 92/100. Key factors: (1) Direct decision-maker (CTO) actively seeking VPN solutions, (2) Budget pre-approved with Q1 timeline indicating immediate need, (3) Enterprise-scale deployment (200+ users, 3 offices), (4) Fintech vertical has stringent security/compliance needs making them ideal fit for premium VPN services, (5) Technical requirements mentioned (AWS integration) shows sophistication and serious evaluation, (6) Proactive request for enterprise plans indicates bottom-of-funnel intent. No disqualification factors present. Immediate sales engagement recommended to capitalize on active buying cycle.

notes: Agent returned JSON wrapped in markdown code fences. The underlying JSON structure is valid and was extracted successfully.
